name: UC - Client-Side Condition
description: Free Plug-in under MIT License, which means it is free for everyone to use, no matter if for commercial or private use. The UC Client-side Condition dynamic action plug-in is the ideal solution for adding if/then/else conditions to determine whether the following actions within the dynamic action should be continued. This plug-in gives you the ability to specify a client-side condition to control whether the execution of dynamic actions continues or stops. If the condition evaluates to TRUE, then the rest of the actions are executed; if the condition evaluates to FALSE, the execution stops, and an optional ELSE custom event can be triggered.
